q: she said Michael Vick 's dogfighting operation probably helped pit bulls' bad rep because it showed that`` people can reintroduce these dogs back into a society that's not going to abuse them.'' The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said. Betsy Adevai, 50, of Grand Rapids, Mich., said muscle dogs have become status symbols for young men who walk through her inner city neighborhood.

awarded in recognition of special achievements and distinguished public service.`` Colin Powell has led an extraordinary life of public service and holds a unique place in American history'' stated Ben Jealous , chief executive office of the NAACP. He rose from humble roots as the son of Jamaican immigrants to become a distinguished military leader, a statesman, a humanitarian and a philanthropist. `` I am proud of the dedication and commitment exhibited by the coaching staff and student-athletes who have represented the University of Michigan football program over the last three seasons,'' Rich Rodriguez said in a statement issued Thursday. While I am disappointed to depart Ann Arbor before we were able to reach the level of success we had in our sights, I am confident that the players who remain have the potential to do great things and to return the Wolverines to greatness. I would like to thank our fans and our student body for their tremendous support. There is great passion for Michigan football and I have made lifelong friends through this experience. Chrysler, which remains the weakest of the three, now has enough resources to deal with another recession, Sergio Marchionne said. And the company is launching more fuel-efficient powertrains so that customers won't flee to other brands as gas prices rise, he said. , Farrington High School officials are disappointed- but not skeptical about the reason- that Michael Vick , here for Sunday's Pro Bowl, canceled a visit to the school that had been set for tomorrow. I have pretty good instincts for this kind of thing, working at a school, said Farrington student-activities coordinator Theresa Ellis .`` I believe Mr. Michael Vick really wants to do this, but obviously all NFL players are very busy people and we have to understand that.'' Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2.
